patthana8.4:4.1: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.4:4.2: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko ceva na nahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.4:4.3: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naahetuko ceva na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.4:5.1: Naahetukañceva na nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko ceva na nahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.4:5.2: Naahetukañceva na nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.4:5.3: Naahetukañceva na nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naahetuko ceva na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.4:6.1: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca naahetukañceva na nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.4:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
